website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and excellent support are offered by the Puma California Exotic. It has been praised for being cute and trendy while providing a retro and versatile appeal. The sneaker is also made of high-quality materials, along with its true-to-size fit.On the other hand, there are only a couple of colorways offered for this shoe. It’s also said to have a very rigid feel that needs to be broken in. At a price of $75, fashionistas looking for style within a budget could find this sneaker very attractive.
pros: The Puma California Exotic is comfortable, a lot of buyers lauded
Most reviewers imparted that they would recommend the sneaker
Many users loved the look of the Puma California Exotic, which they described as cute, trendy, and amazing, with a throwback appeal
More than a handful of purchasers admired the shoe’s high-quality construction and materials
This sneaker fits perfectly, revealed several wearers
A few commenters observed that the Puma California Exotic could be worn with anything
The sneaker offers good support, praised some buyers
cons: There are only a couple of colors available for this model
The Puma California Exotic feels very rigid at first, detected several users
It needs to be broken in

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about these at first.. the “tongue” of the shoe was extremely stiff and dug into the front of my ankles when I would walk. However, about a month later I can say that they have softened up considerably and I really enjoy the look of them.. a little more dressy than regular sneakers. Kind of remind me of some of my early 2000s “skate shoes”. They tend to scuff up pretty easily but so far they haven’t been too much of a pain to clean, I’ve just been scrubbing them with a damp washcloth and a bit of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look nice. But fit a little to tight. Not made for people who have a wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maravilla

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter, to go with her required uniform. The fit well. She liked them even more once she saw them. Under $45 and she is happy, so my wallet and I are happy as well.🥰
customer_reviews.author: DaCurlyHairDiva

customer_reviews.title: The cutest shoe but runs half small
customer_reviews.text: I love the sneaker. The look is amazing. I wear a 7 and when I received it I was so excited to put it on and found the sneaker was a bit tight. I wanted to exchange in the white that I ordered but they are out of the 7.5 so I decided to keep and live with it since the style is cute. I just won't wear it at a dance party lol. But the sneaker is totally stylish and just runs a bit tight. I suggest half a size up. I want to add a photo of my pair I received but seems like I can't.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baehre

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected. Buying Pumas online can be a hit or miss, these are definitely a HIT!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! *spray guard before you wear
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes! I had been stuck on white converse for ever, but being pregnant I needed some support and comfort. And I am so glad being pregnant made me branch out! The only thing I don’t like about these is they’re a little hard to keep the leather up front clean. I got a suede eraser but it only takes away so much. I should have sprayed guard on them before wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this shoe, but they hurt my feet so bad. It’s like walking around in cinderblocks. There’s no movement in them at all. I was limping by the end of my work day. I assumed there would be some ankle blisters, my Vans do this as well while I’m breaking them in. But these made my toes hurt in the worst way. They also rubbed red spots (almost blisters) on all sides of my feet. If you get them, I would definitely order a size up! I ordered my exact size. They were sooooo cute just super painful!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: What  a  great  shoe
customer_reviews.text: They were just a tiny bit rigid around the top when I go them, but I just kept wearing them a few hours every day and voila, they are perfect as of today, 3/4/20. They are like walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Saxbury

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor fitting
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée bought me these sneakers. I had to re-order a half size bigger because they were too tight. These sneakers definitely run small. My new pair are still a little tight but I can work with them. I would STRONGLY suggest buying a whole size up from your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: blessed a-leesh

customer_reviews.title: Pumtastic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes as gift for my wife. They have a classic look & beautiful design. I had an issue with the post office delivery but I finally was able to retrieve them 11 days later thanks to some assistance from the shoebacca team. My wife loves the shoes & I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very stiff
customer_reviews.text: I had to return because they were extremely stiff and hard to walk in. The top part would hit my front of my ankle and formed a blister. They super cute and I wanted to keep but it was just too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: N.Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puma California style sneaker; so when these popped up for under $40, I jumped on it. The sneaker fits as expected. They are kinda stuff, but I know they’ll loosen with wear. I give these a 10!
customer_reviews.author: FlyCoolChick

customer_reviews.title: Not for me- returning
customer_reviews.text: When i put on these shoes I couldn’t breath because it was so tight. After reading the reviews I ordered a size up from my usual size but this one has very funny fitting. It’s just not for people who likes to wear loose fitting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pshara

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearing shoe, but it doesn't feet properly.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I took them out the box but after trying them on with a thin footie I was sadly disappointed. The ankle part of the shoe bucks out on both sides of my feet & no matter how much I tighten the strings it doesn't get any better. So sad that I have to return them😣
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pumas are very comfortable, this one did not disappoint. Seller shipped quicker than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: DyaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe ... HOWEVER..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are nice and takes ne back to my HS years. If you have a short wide foot then you should go a half size up regarding the width across the widest part of the lower foot. I had to take out the inside cushion to wear a thin seamless sock or wear without socks... I still love them and they are comfortable with those adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Tricey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect❤
customer_reviews.text: I just received my first puma sneakers👏 I needed size 24.5cm(JAPANESE) and I went with size chart got US size 8. Perfect fit with little room☺❤ I'm happy with my purchase☺
customer_reviews.author: Shoko HIll

customer_reviews.title: narrow width
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of material and construction and if the shoe wasn't narrow in instep area it would be an A1 shoe. It does tend to slide off of my heel too.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Need to break them in for comfort
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on the arch and tongue. They need to be worn to break in or they are not comfortable. Once they broke in I liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They are so comfortable and I bought a size 9 in women, a 8 1/2 would of probably been a little snug so I bought a 9. I also bought the burgundy and white ones. Looking to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the tongue rub into the front of my ankles
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, style, and feel even though they are more tighter and narrower than what I expected. Easy to get dirty though especially when you have younger children
customer_reviews.author: Rees

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are perfect fit, true to size. And not cheaply made at all. They are made very good and my favorite shoes to wear now.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rak

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to walk in for me the leather is not flexible too hard.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not comfortable for me. They hurt my arch not a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: grannyslots

customer_reviews.title: A little tight..
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe looks great on my foot. The only problem is it's a bit tight. Don't want to go through the hassle of returning them so I'm going to keep them. Read a few reviews and some said after a few weeks of wearing it will loosen up. This shoe is made very well. I also think if I lose a few pounds It won't be as tight.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dobbins-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, simple, comfortable. Firmer sole than I expected but they seem durable. I'd buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: alli R

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes but they are too narrow in the instep and toe box. I have a medium width foot. I bought the Puma Carina’s and those were a much better fit. Also, the tongue on these shoes is a bit stiff and long so it hits your foot when you walk. Sorry but returning them 😩
customer_reviews.author: Weppa

customer_reviews.title: Puma! Great quality for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of the puma sneakers. The fit is comfortable and I love the soft foam inside. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tiarsha

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! Ordered a half size larger & they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: JCoolikethat

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. They fit just right, can't wait to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Nique

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot! There are two different whites on them.
customer_reviews.author: danni

customer_reviews.title: I love this gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the shoes fit perfect. They look better in person that on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carter

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love them but if I order more I will order up a size
customer_reviews.author: Momma Neek

customer_reviews.title: Sole too thick
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because the sole was a little than I prefer. Other than that, there was nothing wrong with them!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: So Nice looking but Fit is Off
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are really nice looking but the fit is a little weird. I usually wear between a size 7 1/2 and 8.... Got the 8 and they slip off.. or at least just one foot does... very weird Tried wearing with thicker socks and socks ride down... tried tightening (which I usually get away with) but they just don't hold...
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what u order when it says only 2 left in stock u may get the wrong item or wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a size 6 1/2 inside of a size 9 box i decided to keep them because my wife could fit them. I was very disappointed because i needed them to wear for a special night. But my wife likes them so thats always a plus u guys got lucky..lol
customer_reviews.author: jamie williams

customer_reviews.title: Off white and white color is DOPE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sneakers. I got them a half a size bigger because I like to have room in my sneakers. The off white with the white combo is DOPE not to mention the rubber sole. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Envy1

customer_reviews.title: Great for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I am using this sneaker for office/work purposes. When i first used than they were a bit tight. But now after a month it feels comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great style of shoe and love white in color
customer_reviews.text: Well cant complain except just needs to be broken in because leather at first can make the shoes stiff and uncomfy which is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Rihanna Marzano

customer_reviews.title: run small
customer_reviews.text: They run super small so I had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: eberlinda

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: They run small but they fit and they are a good walking shoe
customer_reviews.author: Swarren

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality
customer_reviews.text: The look of these shoe is so cute. It’s something you can wear to a sporting event, vacation, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I love style and the color. They were a little stiff for the first few days. Ultimately, I am very pleased with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice quality, kind of narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the leather, have to break them in as they are narrow
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its a ok tennis shoe but I've owned some that's been a lot more confrontable.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice support!
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I wish it was light weight!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Confy sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These Puma sneakers are very comfortable and the tongue is not as long as other sneakers, so that is good. I love the color and for sure I will use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Papini

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My shoes fit perfect! Great quality! They look so cool! I really like the chic style. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tivisai

customer_reviews.title: Painful, uncomfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, but I can not wear them for more than 5 minutes. The hard plastic rubs uncomfortably across my toes and it is super painful/uncomfortable. I’ve never purchased anything so uncomfortable ever.
customer_reviews.author: Pauley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you’re gonna walk a lot in them
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these shoes at all. They’re like wearing plastic on your feet. Very very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 in women had to return for a 9-1/2
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love my new sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching for these to come available and I bought them as soon as they were. I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Candace Rossum

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and great price! I have nothing but good things to say. Shipping waa quick as well. I recommend to anyone who wants to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lovelylyz1

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small and narrow I'm not happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Blanca mendez

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they fit perfectly I am size 7 I ordered size 7 and the fit good
customer_reviews.author: ana abundiz

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly got size 6.5. True to description. Good casual shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jackie•blue

customer_reviews.title: Grandma shoe style
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is not stylish in person. It’s more of a shoe for an elder person with the way it’s designed on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers fit as expected and are comfortable they are exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Davila

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, get compliments. Problem is they are a bit tight. Definitely not a shoe u want to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality of work.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, and the sole is already comes off...
customer_reviews.author: Rozhdiestvin Maxym

customer_reviews.title: Easily "broken in"
customer_reviews.text: Tongue is a lil stiff & slightly uncomfortable at 1st, but it didn't bother me as much I thought it would...
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: One should consider going a half size better.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice with jeans. I wear mine when I go out power walking.may
customer_reviews.author: ines rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Next time I’ll know. Obviously puma runs a little too big.
customer_reviews.text: The size 8 is too big I needed a 7.5 or even a 7
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Reed

customer_reviews.title: More color optiond
customer_reviews.text: L9ve these..would like all leather in black as well.....can you find them for me plz
customer_reviews.author: niambi berry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you average to wide foot. Even went up half a size and still had to return
customer_reviews.text: Like the look but very narrow. And to return them
customer_reviews.author: Patty Templeton

customer_reviews.title: The size
customer_reviews.text: Happy about the size because some times I can fit a 7 1/2 but the 8 was fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For narrow feet only
customer_reviews.text: Can't wear it more than 2 hours. Then it hurts my leg
customer_reviews.author: Anna koutun

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. She really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: R.A

product_meta.title: Puma Women's California Sneaker, Whisper White, 3 UK
product_meta.description: The classic 80’s PUMA California has been brought back as a must need retro sneaker. Originally a laid-back training sneaker, the California is now an on trend streetwear style.
